Package aima.core.agent.impl.aprog.simplerule

Class Summary
ANDCondition Implementation of an AND condition.
Condition Base abstract class for describing conditions.
EQUALCondition Implementation of an EQUALity condition.
NOTCondition Implementation of a NOT condition.
ORCondition Implementation of an OR condition.
Rule A simple implementation of a "condition-action rule".
